summary:
Repeated success in leading cross-functional project, process improvement initiatives, devising business strategies, and providing leadership guidance to multiple high-profile customers. Proficient in identifying clients’ needs, providing technical solutions, and rectifying critical issues. Instrumental in spearheading a diverse portfolio of enterprise programs and projects with strong capability in disseminating technical information to non-technical audiences and achieving organizational objectives through a combination of strategic planning and tactical tenacity. Possess strong communication skills, ability to develop and maintain solid relations at all level within an organization. Furthermore, my consistent focus on remaining at the forefront of rapidly evolving technology allows me to drive enterprise-wide innovation and maintain a competitive advantage. 

Core Competencies:
•	Strategic & Tactical (Infrastructure) Planning
•	Business intelligence and Data Technologies
•	Contract Development / Negotiations
•	Full Life Cycle Project Management	
•	Product Roadmap Development
•	Agile Scrum & Waterfall Methodologies 
•	Business Process Re-engineering
•	PDLC & SDLC Methodologies

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

courses.name: General Skills Leadership training, Training in skills for cooperation, Working in and with groups, Insight into influence, Integratie Mens & Organisatie (TransActional CombiModel)

IT Training (Skills) - Java for Managers, JAVA, Oracle Designer/2000 Forms Design and Generation, Oracle Designer/2000 System Modelling, Server Design, Oracle DMT Modeling Techniques, SAP R/3 LO150 Customer Order Management, Programming in Progress (4GL),

IT Training (skills) SNOW, Certified ISO27001:2017 Implementer, DevOPS CI/CD Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Power BI, DevOPS CI/CD – Githubs Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Power BI,  Azure Migrating On-Premises Infrastructure and Data

IT training (skills) - Progress Master (4GL), SQL, System management Unix, Unix (Shell scripts), ITIL training, Jira, Robotics Process Automation (Automation Anywhere), Microsoft Azure Platform Fundamentals, AWS Cloud Practitioner Essential

Message types/formats/regulations : EDIFACT (Transport/Logistics; Banking Formats), (Inter)National Banking Payment formats, SEPA (ISO 20022 - PAIN, CAMT ), SWIFT (Miscellaneous Message Types), Cards ISO8583, EMV 3DS, Regulatory Technical Standards / 2FA
Methodologies and Techniques:  Scrum, Agile, Prince 2, ERD, DFD, FPA, Oracle DMT, SDM, UML, Niam, Structured Analysis and Design Yourdon, TOGAF 9.2 Fundamentals
Programming Languages - Java, Pegasystems Workbench, Progress (4GL), SQL, HTML

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: As a Programme Manager I am responsible for a large scale IT transformation to support the business goals. The business goal is to have a state of the art platform that supports future growth and improved services (better, with a shorter time to market) for its customers. I manage the internal and external parties, the multidisciplinary software development teams involved with the delivery of the new-to-be platform. Adaptation of new technologies, transforming the on-premises situation to the cloud (Datawarehouse infrastructure and the new to be delivered platform). I am monitoring the scope, time, budget / businesses case and assure that the projects are realised and implemented smoothly. The Programme makes use of the Agile / Scrum methodologies and so further improving Quion to become more Agile. I keep the stakeholders aligned and ensure that all projects are closely aligned to ensure that the delivery matches the business, stakeholders needs.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
ARS Traffic & Transport Technology is a leading ITS company, active mainly in Europe and Asia with over 300 skilled professionals. It is a strong supplier of innovative parking solutions for both oﬀ-street and on-street parking, with best-of-breed solutions for governmental institutions (provinces, cities, municipalities) and commercial companies that own their own parking facilities or enforce parking on behalf of the governmental institutions.

ARS combines its solid traﬃc engineering expertise with our latest knowledge of software and hardware to provide solutions ranging from full on-street managed service oﬀerings, including enforcement services, permit services and parking machine operation/maintenance services, to dynamic guided parking and integrated navigation/parking applications for oﬀ-street parking solutions.

As Senior Project Manager, Product Owner managing all the aspects, projects of a (to be further) developed parking IT product / SAAS solution for municipalities like Antwerp, Amsterdam (and more). From inception till completion, delivery as per defined time, quality, and budget with teams in The Netherlands and India.
Key Achievements:
-	Direct management of concurrent client facing projects in development and servicing stages with 20+ FTE multiple associated (multi-vendor)  teams both locally and off-shore
-	Change management initiatives for introduction of agile software development methodologies (based on a product roadmap) with our NL and India subsidiary
- Orchestrate daily stand-up meeting, updating the professionals with (changing) project’s requirements, assuring delivery to meet and exceed clients’ expectations.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Manager

profile_positions.description: During this period I am working in the role of Sr. Project Manager responsible for delivering a project, solution for Ingenico ePayments. Responsible for the Inception Phase, preparing and organizing the realization phase of the project. Realizing a Microsoft Azure based Platform to support the reconciliation processes of Ingenico ePayments. Managing 3 teams at Ingenico, ReconWork, and a IT software development team. Delivering a commercial proposal, a proposed (product) roadmap, for the realisation phase. The platform will be  build, set-up in a highly scalable Azure environment (with Kubernetes, DevOPS, CI/CD pipeline) to support the proposed roadmap. Facilitating the daily stand-up’s, creating awareness of the agile way of working in the role of Agile coach / Scrum Master.
profile_positions.title: Sr.Project Manager

profile_positions.description: During this period I worked in the role of Product owner/Project Manager (COPAFITH) responsible for delivering multiple projects for the Commercial Cards department. Responsible for the initiation and realization of these projects, for example due to changing (EU interchange, Mastercard, PSD2, RTS) regulations, Product development. Implementing the product in Bulgaria, Ireland and Switzerland and the Netherlands. Realizing a new Microsoft Azure based Portal (INGCommercialcard.com) and APP (Android and IOS), migrating current customers from the old channels to the new channels, shutting down the old channels (including paper statements) as part of a channel strategy/roadmap. Building new functionality on top of the new portal and APP. Delivered contracts (SAAS, SLA, SOW’s) with the external parties such as Fraedom (New Zealand/UK), TSYS (UK and USA), RSA (Israel) and MasterCard (NL and USA) in cooperation with Legal/Procurement/Compliance/Tax and business stakeholders, assuring that suppliers delivered as agreed. Development of the new Portal and APP was done based on the Agile way of working. Conducting IT and Business analyses, managing multiple teams, Project Managers, Squads / team members in order to successfully complete these projects. The last release had as focus on requirements related to PSD2 (2 factor authentication), a more secure method (access/logon to the account with biometrics via the APP and approving e-commerce transactions) was introduced. Facilitating the daily stand-up’s, creating awareness of the agile way of working in the role of Agile coach / Scrum Master.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project & Change Manager (Commercial Cards)

profile_positions.description: During this period I worked in the role of Project Manager (COPAFITH). Responsible for the initiation, realization (hard and software) of the product FinBOX (Dutch e-invoicing standard) based on SCRUM/XP (Capgemini team in NL and India). Realizing new contracts with parties such as PostNL (ING and PostNL where both sponsor of this new platform to be realized) and Capgemini (NL and India). Realize a totally new hardware environment externally hosted. Conducting/organized IT audits (with the guidance and support of ING ORM/IRM), security tests (Fortify-Java sources, Verizon – Infra). Phasing out of the old platform (INGIS/Anachron). Maintaining contacts with ING and PostNL Product Management, Interbank (Payment Association NL, Rabobank, ABN AMRO, ING Bank), local OPS/IT, management and clients (ING and PostNL), Project Managers, department heads, external suppliers (Anachron, Capgemini, Verizon), Global Procurement Bank, legal ING and legal PostNL. Unfortunately ING and Post NL had to decide to stop the project since the E-Invoicing business wasn’t delivering the value that initially was perceived at the start of the project.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project & Change Manager (e-Invoicing)

profile_positions.description: During this period working in the role of Project Manager (COPAFITH) responsible for initiating and realizing a new product, ING Safe Cash Service (a ATM service turned upside down, process and IT wise). Delivering the necessary (SLA, IT Delivery) contracts to be able to support after project completion. Maintain contacts with PCM Product Management CB Legal, OIB/Ops Leeuwarden, Global Procurement Bank, Cash In Transit supplier (CIT) Brinks. Project leaders, department heads. Conducting analyses, managing multiple team members in order to successfully complete these projects.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project and Change Manager (Cash)

profile_positions.description: During this period work in the role of Program Manager(COPAFITH) of the change area ING E-Business Cash and Cards (EBCC). Responsible for initiating and realizing the projects in scope. Organizing and managing Steering Committee meetings, organizing workshops by working closely with concerned Managers, managing several Project Leaders, teams. Interacting with various stakeholders, capturing program / project status, sharing status updates and reports to senior management. Maintain contacts (stakeholder management) with central functions like IT, Legal, Finance, PMO departments, TOGAF Architects. Successfully managed the Supply and Demand within the financial bandwidths and timelines.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager (E-Business Cash & Cards)

profile_positions.description:
Overlapping period with several projects and role's :
- Project Manager merger ING Bank NV – Billington BV
- Projectmanager SEPA ING Channels (click, call and Face)
- Project Manager ING Inside Business Channel
- Projectmanager Bulk payment channels (Finstream) 
- Business analyst
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Business analist (Payments and Cash Management)

profile_positions.description: During this period I was working in the role of Project Manager (COPAFITH) of a new to be delivered e-commerce product iDEAL (Acquiring) together with 3 other banks (ING, SNS and Rabobank) and an external supplier (Atos Worldline) via multiple releases (Release 1, Go-Live in 2005). Drawing up project plans and aligning them with the responsible parties, change managers, Product Management (of the 3 banks), external supplier (ATOS Wordline) and other parties. ING has played a leading role in the necessary decision-making (MoSCoW) and (product, interbank) governance for the releases. Implementing the local (OPS and IT) service managing organization. Monitoring these plans, aligning them and reporting on their progress. Maintaining contacts with client (s), the other banks product and Project Leaders, IDEAL domestic program, department heads and external suppliers. Conducting analyses, managing multiple team members in order to successfully complete these project phases and the product launch of iDEAL (https://www.ideal.nl).
profile_positions.title: Project manager iDEAL (e-Business)

profile_positions.description:
During this period I worked in the role of a Business analyst (for the future electronic Channels) with which the assignment was formulated; Research and describe the COPAFITJ-wide consequences of developing and releasing a vision in which the current 11 channels migrate to a desired 4 channels. The following part results were obtained:
-a description of the Soll business requirements, in collaboration with the business.
-a description of the Soll IT requirements of the 11 current channels in collaboration with various architects (based on Zachman framework) and Information Analysts.
-blueprint a possible future IST situation (from 11 channels to 4)
-strategic scenarios for releasing this future situation 
A future roadmap was designed and presented (an information plan, a detailed vision) to the management EDV and I&EB. However, the program was confronted with a major change of the ING organization, which at the time it was decided not to continue the program. For the projects Finstream/EBW/GADGET (Swift Messaging) I acted in the role of Project Leader, Information Analyst, Test Manager.
profile_positions.title: IT Business analyst (e-Bussines / channels)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for designing, drafting a test process with associated test organisation, programming test tooling. Advising on the test strategies and resources to be used. Responsible for the technical advice regarding the Compuware products to the update/test units. As a Lead information analyst responsible for design of a new to be delivered  bulk payments channel for ING (Swift, EU domestic and international payment services).Worked as a contractor via Match4
profile_positions.title: Informatiespecialist, IT / Business analyst

profile_positions.description: In that period I was working as an Information Analyst, analyzing business processes and translating them into a functional, technical design and developing the software. In the role of the analyst aligning with programmers so that they could build the software. Preparation of FPA to assess the expected costs and performing functional tests. Having contacts with the external customer at a functional and tactical level, in order to have the desired functionality delivered. Worked as a contractor via Match4.
profile_positions.title: Business Analist / Developer

profile_positions.description: From (initially) a functional management/maintenance responsibility (for the logistics information systems) evolved in the role of a system engineer/Project Manager for a new, to be implemented (purchased) ERP system (inventory, purchasing, manufacturing, Sales Order Management, Forecast, financial management, EDI, CRP, MRP; Supplier MFG/PRO). Conducting information analysis, drafting functional and technical specifications. Developing software in the 4 GL language Progress and implementing these new functionalities. Researching, Analyzing and advising on new areas to automate or to provide a formal automation system. Coordinating the design, solution (internal or external), realization and implementation these realized functionalities. Coordinating maintenance on the logistic information systems. Supporting and advising (logistically) projects to improve the processes. At the time I had left the organization, (almost) all the old systems were phased out and the factories in The Hague and in Huizen were completely moved to the new ERP system (MFG/Pro).
profile_positions.title: ERP Implementer / System engineer (ERP systems consultant / implementer)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for producing, via high-tech production processes ISDN telecom equipment as a final product, based on an accepted production plan, realization in accordance with this production plan. Manage, coach and hire or fire of a team of 20-25 employees. Advice on training / development of employees. Responsible for production, the warehouse, new product introduction, the quality of equipment delivered, system testing, packaging and delivery. Managing Lean Six Sigma projects with the aim of being more efficient and/or cheaper
profile_positions.title: Team Manager
